ArguEdit.bin

Safe HaskellSafe-Infered

Specification.ArguModel

Description

This the core model of ArguEdit. Basic structure of the transcription of argumentations as well as fundamental operations on them can be found here.

Documentation

type ArgElemId = Int

type ArgPairForest a b = [Tree (a, b)]

type ArgPairTree a b = Tree (a, b)

test_id_tree :: Tree (String, ArgElemId)

removeById :: Eq b => [Tree (a, b)] -> b -> [Tree (a, b)]

moveById :: Eq b => Tree (a, b) -> b -> MoveDirection -> Tree (a, b)
